data.Name: Indigo Jones
data.Bio: Band Members: Scott Alexander (vocals/guitar) Tony Gilfellon (vocals/guitar) Miguel Navarro (drums) Pete Gilfellon (bass) I am not close to this band however i like their music and have met the members and they are all very down to earth great guys.. here is a review that i picked up from there myspace. Manchester Evening News review Indigo Jones - 40 Miles (Skinny Dog Records) ****** by Paul O'Brien MANCHESTER could well be the most musically diverse city in the UK, if not Europe. Read more on Last.fm
